DataElement.preferredName: Work Productivity and Activity Impairment General Health V2.0 Questionnaire Currently Employed Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Persons' stated observation of whether or not they are currently employed.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Work Productivity and Activity Impairment General Health V2.0 Questionnaire Currently Employed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The second version of a standardized survey originally developed by Margaret C. Reilly in 1993 which is used to evaluate the extent to which a patient's general health problems effects their ability to work and perform daily activities. This instrument consists of 6 questions which can be completed by the patient or in an interview format._A question about whether an individual is currently employed.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Work Productivity and Activity Impairment General Health V2.0 Questionnaire
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The second version of a standardized survey originally developed by Margaret C. Reilly in 1993 which is used to evaluate the extent to which a patient's general health problems effects their ability to work and perform daily activities. This instrument consists of 6 questions which can be completed by the patient or in an interview format.

Concepts.longName: Work Productivity and Activity Impairment General Health V2.0 Questionnaire
Concepts.definition: The second version of a standardized survey originally developed by Margaret C. Reilly in 1993 which is used to evaluate the extent to which a patient's general health problems effects their ability to work and perform daily activities. This instrument consists of 6 questions which can be completed by the patient or in an interview format.

Property.preferredDefinition: A question about whether an individual is currently employed.

Concepts.definition: A question about whether an individual is currently employed.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
